sentence.Network_en: She has brought disgrace upon womankind.
It had dawned upon me that I have never placed a proper valuation upon womankind.
sentence.Network_cn: 我这才觉得,我一向不曾对女性给以应有的估价.

sentence.Network_en: In today's 5 liberated world, it is difficult to understand how important this 6 ) event was for 7 ) womankind.
sentence.Network_cn: 在今天这个妇女解放的世界, 我们很难理解这件事对妇女的重要性.

entry.def: You can refer to all women as womankind when considering them as a group.
